mapper.select: SELECT main.remark AS conferenceId, main.conference_name AS conferenceName, main.promotion_id AS activityId, main.promotion_title AS activityName, main.order_code AS orderCode, main.store_name AS storeName, item.item_id AS packageId, item.item_name AS packageName, item.item_price AS packagePrice, item.item_cnt AS packageQuantity, main.total_amount AS totalAmount, main.type AS orderType, main.status AS orderStatus, main.order_details_desc AS orderDetailsDesc, main.create_time AS orderTime, main.create_user_phone AS receiverMobileNumber, main.receiver_name AS receiverName, main.receiver_address AS receiverAddress, main.salesman AS salesman, main.comment AS comment FROM ( SELECT * FROM promotion_seckill_order_main ${ew.customSqlSegment} ) main LEFT JOIN promotion_seckill_order_item item ON main.order_code = item.order_code
